events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I ordered.
System has identified the issue as a refund request related to receiving an incorrect product in the order.
The refund request case has been assigned to Customer Support Agent Linda for further handling.
Hello! I’m Linda from Customer Support. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. I’m here to help resolve this issue quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received so we can process your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and I have attached a photo showing that I received a different product than what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and arrange for a pickup of the incorrect item at no cost to you.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help in resolving this so fast.
Your refund has been processed successfully and the return pickup is scheduled for tomorrow. Please contact us if you face any issues.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been received and the return process was smooth. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case now as the refund and return were completed successfully. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
